title: Frieze patterns over finite commutative local rings
abstract:
We count numbers of tame frieze patterns with entries in a finite commutative
local ring. For the ring $\mathbb{Z}/p^r\mathbb{Z}$, $p$ a prime and
$r\in\mathbb{N}$ we obtain closed formulae for all heights. These may be
interpreted as formulae for the numbers of certain relations in quotients of
the modular group.
